string-array.name: sabias
string-array.item: El Puente de Toledo, located in Madrid, is a historical symbol of Spanish civil engineering from the 18th century.
The La Cartuja ceramics factory in Seville, in San Lorenzo de El Escorial, is an outstanding example of industrial architecture.
La Real Fábrica de Tapices, in Madrid, is one of the few carpet factories that still produces artisanal carpets in Europe.
The El Águila beer factory, in Madrid, is an icon of industrial architecture from the 19th century.
The Real Fábrica de Cristales de La Granja, in San Ildefonso, produces crystals for Spanish royalty for centuries.
El Matadero de Madrid, now a cultural center, was in its beginnings one of the main slaughterhouses of the city.
The San Isidro Thermal Power Station, in Madrid, was one of the first electrical power stations in the city.
The La Cantábrica flour factory, in Madrid, is an example of industrial architecture from the 19th century.
The Moncloa ceramics factory, in Madrid, is an important industrial heritage of the city.
The Delicias railway station, in Madrid, is a magnificent example of industrial architecture from the 19th century.
The Mahou beer factory, in Madrid, is one of the oldest breweries in Spain.
The La China ceramics factory, in Madrid, is an outstanding example of neo-Mudejar industrial architecture.
The Toledo weapons factory, in Madrid, is an important military industrial heritage.
The La Imperial flour factory, in Madrid, is an example of industrial architecture from the 19th century.
The old cigarette factory in Lavapiés, in Madrid, is now a cultural center.
The El León furniture factory, in Madrid, is an example of industrial architecture from the 19th century.
The La Elipa paper factory, in Madrid, is an important industrial heritage of the city.
The Vallecas bronze casting factory, in Madrid, is an example of industrial architecture from the 19th century.
The old cork factory La Montaña, in Madrid, is now a cultural and leisure space.
The La China ceramics factory, in Madrid, is one of the few examples of neo-Mudejar industrial architecture that exists in the city.
